article_text:
A man has been killed in a shooting at a concert venue where rapper T.I. was scheduled to perform Wednesday night, according to law enforcement officials.

The incident occurred backstage in the third floor V.I.P area of the Irving Plaza music venue i...

og.description: Winston-Salem police say one person was killed in a hit-and-run Saturday morning.
og.title: Winston-Salem police investigate fatal hit-and-run
